name: Ember.js
description: A quick reference for ember.js, an open-source JavaScript application framework

Basics.val: Allows to add routes and resources to app
Call this function when app is ready to be initialized
Delays initialization until advanceReadiness is called
Add a property onto every object of a specific type

Ember.Application.val: Creates an instance that will be app and app's namespace
Activate logging of automatically generated routes and controllers
Activate logging of deprecated method or property usage
Activate basic logging of successful transitions

Ember.View.val: Array of View's property names used to calculate View's DOM element's attributes
Array of View's property names used to calculate View's DOM element's class attribute
Array or string of View's class attribute

Ember.Application.initializer.val: Name of the initializer to run before running this initializer
Function to execute when an app is initializing

Ember.Route.val: Hooked called when router enters route the first time
Hook executes when the router completely exits this route

Ember.Object.val: Method called when an instance of this class is created
